title: BofA: ‘More buying of the dip’ seen among retail and institutional investors - Yahoo Finance
content: BofA: ‘More buying of the dip’ seen among retail and institutional investors  Yahoo Finance
description: The S&P 500 continues to further its 52-week low point as inflation came in hotter than expected for April. In light of the market trough, however, a recent Bank of America Global Research report notes that retail and institutional investors continue to “buy the dip.”
